short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows Flash Player access to all Individual Software Typing sites automatically

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Individual Software’s Typing Flash Enabler
*** Chrome Version 86 Update ***
As of Chrome Version 86, this extension won't function properly. Chrome has blocked the ability to allow Extensions to automatically enable Flash webpages. We apologize for the inconvenience. You should still be able to run our websites by following the prompts to enable Flash.
*********************

Individual Software’s Typing Flash Enabler for the Chrome Browser is now available. The Enabler manages Flash permissions automatically for all our Web Typing Apps. By using the Enabler, users can access all Individual Software’s Web Typing Apps automatically. This includes: Typing Instructor Web, Typing Instructor Platinum Web, Typing Instructor for Kids Web, and Disney Mickey’s Typing Adventure Web.

Users can add the Typing Flash Enabler at no cost. This Enabler automatically gives the browser permission so Individual Software’s Web Typing Apps load seamlessly. The Enabler will not affect your browser experience or your computer/device performance. Without the Enabler, you must enable Flash manually, every time you start one of the Typing Apps.

*** ATTENTION ***
If your home or organization uses firewall rules, you may need to also allow access to www.individualsoftware.com for this extension to work properly.
